export-entities.name: APPLICATION/Autorun.exe
export-entities.pql:
ID 40 STATUS APPROVED CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON TRUE BY appuser.did = resource.dso.owner DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.accessgroupid has 12 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "APPLICATION/Autorun.exe" = ((TRUE AND TRUE) AND (TRUE AND application.name = "**\\Autorun.exe"))

export-entities.name: APPLICATION/Monitor All Applications - Exceptions
export-entities.pql:
ID 2 STATUS APPROVED CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON TRUE BY (appuser.did = resource.dso.owner OR FALSE) DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY (TRUE OR appuser.accessgroupid has 12) DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "APPLICATION/Monitor All Applications - Exceptions" = (((FALSE OR TRUE) AND TRUE) AND (TRUE AND TRUE))

export-entities.pql:

COMPONENT "RESOURCE/My Documents" = (((FALSE OR resource.fso.name = "[mydocuments]\\**") AND TRUE) AND (TRUE AND TRUE))
